attributes.action: Block the Strathclyde Police Chief Constuble Steven House & Divisional Commander, Anne McGuire dissolving the Strathclyde Police Pipe Band
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Strathclyde Police Pipe Band is a Scottish institution, and a well respected and loved member of the Pipe Band Community. It Currently competes in Grade 1.

Previously The Goven band and formed under an act of parliament. Over the years the name has changed, but today The Govern Band is Strathclyde Police Pipe Band.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
